reviews.review_msg: AMAZING prof. I love her so much! The kindest, sweetest lady doing super interesting research. Very helpful and willing to help you if youre struggling. No exams.

Kimberly Plomb is the best teacher, & even better for online, she is so great & flexible with online, she is one of the only teachers not to give me stress, & i really did learn a lot from her class that you'll use in life, & understanding infectious diseases. I cant stress it enough how great she was, wish sfu had more prof like her

Hands down the most amazing prof I have ever had at SFU. She is so caring and gives such interesting lectures. I took evolutionary medicine with her as an intersessional and enjoyed it a lot, she was extra accessible and understanding during the COVID-19 pandemic. Wish the class wasn't intersessional so I didn't have to say goodbye

He's a great lecturer and extremely knowledgeable, you'll learn a lot from him. You absolutely need to be in class every day and take detailed notes, exams are straight from lectures. Exams are kinda tough but fair, no surprises. Dennis is a great guy, really funny and approachable. I recommend his class but be ready to put the work in.

This man is awesome. Lectures are really well structured. He is very experienced in his field (Neanderthals) and knows so much. Also very entertaining and funny as well as very approachable if you need help or just want to talk about whatever.
